footerText:
This site is based on Tinto, A Nuxt-Tina Starter repository. Join in! You can use Tinto too, according to the terms specified in the [Hippocratic License HL3-FULL](https://firstdonoharm.dev/version/3/0/full.html).

![](/assets/images/asterIcon.png)You can also have a nice flower in the footer wysiwyg text.
